ygData.subject: Bardic Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all.  I was wondering if anyone knew about our skill caps? Specifically, Hand to Hand - for a while now, mine has stopped at 3 * level + 1.  Does
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all. I was wondering if anyone knew about our skill caps?

Specifically, Hand to Hand - for a while now, mine has stopped at 3 * level
+ 1. Does anyone know if this is the limit for us in this skill? I've
asked several of our bardic kin in-game, and no one seems to know the
answer for sure (I got a lot of people curious though :)

Oh, and one more thing - does anyone know if there are any specific
differences in using the various instruments avaliable in the game? (for
example - the mandolin and the lute - is it just the weight that's
different? or a brass horn and a mino horn?)


Dantos, bard of The Rathe
